<div class="container-fluid">

<div class="row">

<div class="cpics-logo"><img class="logo" src='images/logos/Logo-CPICS_White_1.webp'></div>
<br><br>
<div class="col-md-9" style="padding-right: 2%">
<div class="row text">

<form name="CPICS_participation" method="POST" data-netlify="true">

<!-- ARE you a CS member -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
Only fill out this form if you are a student/postdoctorate fellow member of Centre SEVE.<br>

If you don't know if you are a member, search for your professor <a href="https://centreseve.recherche.usherbrooke.ca/en/researchers">here</a>


</fieldset>
</div>

<!-- Name -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Name</legend>
<label for="firstName">First name</label><input type="text" name="firstName" id="firstName" aria-required="true" data-ok="false">
<span class="error-msg" id="firstNameErr"></span>
</div>
<div class="form-row">
<label for="lastName">Last name</label><input type="text" name="lastName" id="lastName" aria-required="true" data-ok="false">
<span class="error-msg" id="lastNameErr"></span>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br><br>
<!-- University -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Your lab</legend>
<label for="University">University</label><input type="text" name="University" id="University" aria-required="true" data-ok="false">
<span class="error-msg" id="UniversityErr"></span>
<label for="Supervisor">Name of your supervisor</label><input type="text" name="Supervisor" id="Supervisor" aria-required="true" data-ok="false">
</fieldset>
</div>
<br><br>

<!-- Email -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>E-mail</legend>
<input type="text" name="email" id="email" aria-required="true" data-ok="false">
<span class="error-msg" id="emailErr"></span>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br><br>

<!-- Status -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Your status</legend>
<input type="radio" id="masters" name="status" required="required" value="Master's student">
<label for="masters">Master's student</label>
<input type="radio" id="phd" name="status" required="required" value="Ph.D. student">
<label for="phd">Ph.D. student</label>
<input type="radio" id="postdoc" name="status" required="required" value="Postdoctorate fellow">
<label for="postdoc">Postdoctorate fellow</label>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br><br>

<button type="submit" class="btn" aria-disabled="true" aria-describedby="CSmemberErr">Submit</button>
</form>

</div>
</div>
